passives.name: Nordswain's Glow Extension
passives.desc:
Nordswain's Glow use +1

When using Nordswain's Glow:
 ‚Ä¢ BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 ‚Ä¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 ‚Ä¢ Slight MAG ATK Up boost
 ‚Ä¢ Triggers additional HP attack after use
passives.short_desc: Nordswain's Glow Extension: Boost to Nordswain's Glow

passives.name: All Buff Attack Speed
passives.desc: Moderately raises party's ATK„ÄÅ SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: All Buff Attack Speed: Raises party's ATK„ÄÅ SPD

passives.name: Heaven's Wrath Extension
passives.desc:
Heaven's Wrath use +1

When using Heaven's Wrath:
 ‚Ä¢ Tremendous BRV damage boost
 ‚Ä¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 ‚Ä¢ Slight PHY ATK Up boost
 ‚Ä¢ Slight MAX BRV Up boost„ÄÅ extended to party
 ‚Ä¢ Moderate own MAX BRV Up boost
 ‚Ä¢ Triggers additional HP attack after use

After using Heaven's Wrath:
 ‚Ä¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage) for 6 turns
passives.short_desc: Heaven's Wrath Extension: Boost to Heaven's Wrath
